source_quote: definition of a bullish order block is the lowest candle or price bar with a down close...

signature.condition: IF price forms the lowest candle with a down close near support (bullish order block)
signature.action: THEN validate it when a later candle trades through the high of that down candle
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly defines order block validation

source_quote: entry techniques... when price trades higher away from the bullish order block and then returns...

signature.condition: IF price trades higher away from a bullish order block then retraces to its high
signature.action: THEN enter long at the retest of the order block high
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly teaches this entry model

source_quote: defining risk with bullish order block... the low of the bullish order block is the location of a relatively safe stop loss...

signature.condition: IF a bullish order block is validated (high broken)
signature.action: THEN place stop loss below the low of the order block or below 50% of its range
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly defines risk management for order blocks

source_quote: we have indications that there has been displacement in the marketplace... institutional sponsorship behind the move

signature.condition: IF price shows displacement after breaking a bullish order block high
signature.action: THEN this confirms institutional participation (bullish bias)
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly links displacement to institutional bias

source_quote: eventually price will drive down into that down candle or bullish order blocks high at that moment if you're in front of your charts that's when you enter the market with a long position

signature.condition: IF price retraces to bullish order block high
signature.action: THEN enter long position at down candle body high
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as entry model pattern

source_quote: we're buying or entering long inside of a known range at a bullish order block at internal range liquidity... we're going to be looking to sell our position to willing buyers in the form of those indi

signature.condition: IF entering long at bullish order block
signature.action: THEN target external range liquidity above old high for profit taking
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as confirmation pattern

source_quote: eventually price should show a responsiveness and trade up and through our old high

signature.condition: IF price trades up and through an old high after entering at a bullish order block
signature.action: THEN take partial or all profits
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as entry model pattern

source_quote: if the monthly chart is bearish the weekly charts bearish and the daily charts bearish

signature.condition: IF monthly, weekly, and daily charts are bearish
signature.action: THEN look to sell rallies on intraday charts (4H and below)
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as HTF bias context

source_quote: you're going to be looking to sell rallies protected by stop raids or returns to bearish order blocks

signature.condition: IF price rallies intraday with bearish HTF bias
signature.action: THEN look to sell at bearish order blocks, FVGs, or liquidity voids
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as entry model pattern

source_quote: the markets are predisposed to go lower because the monthly weekly daily we have arrived at a bias that we have seen price want to go lower

signature.condition: IF monthly/weekly/daily charts show lower lows and lower highs with support levels breaking
signature.action: THEN bias is bearish and look to sell rallies protected by stop raids, bearish order blocks, or FVGs
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly states higher timeframe bias

source_quote: your trade on a short could be looking to take advantage of buying back below a daily low where cell stops would be resting

signature.condition: IF bearish higher timeframe bias (monthly/weekly/daily)
signature.action: THEN target short trades below recent daily lows where sell stops would be resting
signature.drawer_basis: ICT describes specific entry targeting liquidity

source_quote: interest rate charts four hours or less will be correcting and retracing lower this is where you anticipate the market to enter into a discount and seek sell side liquidity to buy from

signature.condition: IF bullish monthly/weekly/daily charts
signature.action: THEN look for buy entries at discount (sell-side liquidity) targeting above recent highs
signature.drawer_basis: ICT defines premium/discount positioning

source_quote: you're going to be looking for buy stops above the marketplace on a daily high

signature.condition: IF bullish higher timeframe bias
signature.action: THEN target buy trades above daily highs where buy stops would be resting
signature.drawer_basis: ICT specifies liquidity-based entry

source_quote: we have equal highs here okay and price came down and hit level of support

signature.condition: IF price forms equal highs on higher timeframe
signature.action: THEN expect buy stops above those equal highs
signature.drawer_basis: ICT identifies structural liquidity levels

source_quote: price comes down hits that okay and we're gonna wait to see if there's a willingness to trade away from it

signature.condition: IF price hits a support level and shows willingness to trade away from it by violating the down candle's high
signature.action: THEN a bullish order block is validated
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught order block validation as market structure

source_quote: we now have a order block that's validated so now we can be a buyer if price comes back down into this candles opening

signature.condition: IF a bullish order block is validated
signature.action: THEN buy if price retraces back to the opening price of the validating candle
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught order block entries as entry models

source_quote: price hits it... the market did in fact trade all the way up through to equal highs

signature.condition: IF price trades down into a validated order block level
signature.action: THEN expect bullish continuation toward equal highs
signature.drawer_basis: Equal highs represent liquidity draw (HTF bias)

signature.condition: IF a down candle forms off a validated support level
signature.action: THEN it may become a new bullish order block if price retraces into its opening price
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught order block formation rules

source_quote: price trades down into it here and we wait to see does price want to rally away

signature.condition: IF price trades down into a monthly bullish order block
signature.action: THEN anticipate buying opportunities at that level
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as entry model pattern

source_quote: price does that here it violates this down candle right here

signature.condition: IF price violates a down candle's high on a weekly chart
signature.action: THEN refine the monthly order block level to that point
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as market structure refinement

source_quote: price trades down into it notice the down candles midpoint or mean threshold

signature.condition: IF price trades back down into a refined monthly order block level
signature.action: THEN be a buyer at that level with expectation of a run
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as entry model pattern

source_quote: higher time frame is suggesting we're going to be going higher overall

signature.condition: IF higher timeframe suggests long-term upward trend
signature.action: THEN avoid bearish order blocks and look to buy dips
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as HTF bias context

source_quote: we don't look at that as we're going to get short here when it trades up to that

signature.condition: IF higher time frame suggests long-term upward trend
signature.action: THEN avoid bearish order blocks and look to buy dips
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught HTF bias drives order block avoidance

source_quote: this candle trading through the last down candle right here that validates this down candle

signature.condition: IF price trades through last down candle before moving higher
signature.action: THEN validate bullish order block at that level
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught order block validation criteria

source_quote: what i like to look for is two to three heights or the range if you will of the order block

signature.condition: IF price rallies 2-3 times the height of an order block
signature.action: THEN expect retracement back into the order block for long entry
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught order block retracement entry model

source_quote: this down candle has traded into that old order block as well so now we have a higher bullish order block

signature.condition: IF price trades into old order block and forms higher bullish order block
signature.action: THEN refine level to the higher order block
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught order block refinement process
